text: Journey for Survival is a 1981 American short documentary film directed by Dick Young. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== *Journey for Survival at the United Nations Audiovisual Library * Category:1981 films Category:1981 short films Category:1981 documentary films Category:American films Category:English- language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films
title: Journey for Survival
